projectelo.text.socketmessage.loading: Aan het verbinden met de server...
projectelo.text.socketmessage.verificati: Valideren van account is mislukt! Probeer het spel te herstarten.
projectelo.text.socketmessage.error: Kan geen verbinding maken met de server door een serverfout!
projectelo.text.socketmessage.disconnect: Verbinding met de server verbroken. Is je internet stabiel?
projectelo.text.socketmessage.outdated: Je gebruikt een verouderde versie van de mod!
projectelo.text.socketmessage.mojang_aut: Speler verificatiegegevens konden niet worden geladen vanuit de Minecraft Auth API
projectelo.text.socketmessage.ssl_verify: Authenticatie van de SSL handshake mislukt. Probeer uw Java bij te werken naar de nieuwste versie.
projectelo.text.matchtype.casual.descrip:
Casually race against a larger range of players.
This mode won't affect your elo rating.
projectelo.text.matchtype.ranked.descrip:
Race against an opponent of similar skill,
in the same seed at the same time.

Try to improve your elo
by competing against another player with similar Elo.
projectelo.text.matchtype.event.descript:
Race against random players with a unique ruleset!
This mode won't affect your elo rating.
projectelo.text.failed_load_timeline: There's no timeline data for this match. :(
projectelo.text.failed_find_match.mainta: Failed to find match because the server is under maintenance. Check the Discord server.
projectelo.text.failed_find_match.alread: You are already joined the match. It might be bug, please report this.
projectelo.text.failed_find_match.not_av: You are using Spectator account. You can spectating only private room.
projectelo.text.start_command.descriptio: Execute this command when joined the world. The maximum length is %s characters. You can separate command line by semicolon(;)
projectelo.text.room_name.description: Displays custom room name on "Current Match" section during match. The maximum length is %s characters. Available if you are a Patreon supporter with Tier 2 or higher tier.
projectelo.text.confirm_reset_world: Are you sure you want to reset this world?
projectelo.text.confirm_leave_match: Are you sure you want to forfeit this match?
projectelo.text.confirm_end_match: Are you sure you want to end this match?
projectelo.text.chat_available: You can chat with other players in the same match.
projectelo.text.chat_unavailable: You have disabled chat from the players in your match.
projectelo.text.mute_available: If you don't want to see a specific player's chat, open the chat screen and enable mute.
projectelo.text.gui_position: §eClick somewhere on the screen to change the position.
projectelo.text.gui_position.move: Press §eCtrl + arrow §fkey to precisely adjust the position.
projectelo.text.recommend_auto_toggle_aa: It is recommended to toggle off SpeedRunIGT's 'Auto Toggle to Any%%/AA' feature. The timer may not stop.
projectelo.text.new_update_found: New Update for '%s' has been found!
projectelo.text.suggest_download_update: Do you want to download? (Current: v%s, Latest: v%s)
projectelo.text.relaunch_instance: Just re-launch this instance for updated version.
projectelo.text.started_seed_change_vote: %s has started a seed change vote. If you agree within 30 seconds, the seed will change.
projectelo.text.approved_seed_change_vot: Everyone agreed to the seed change vote. A new world will be created after 5 seconds.
projectelo.text.rejected_seed_change_vot: The seed change vote was canceled due to disagreement.
projectelo.text.started_draw_vote: %s has started a draw vote. If you agree within 30 seconds, this match will end in a draw.
projectelo.text.rejected_draw_vote: The draw vote was canceled due to disagreement.
projectelo.text.disconnected_server.norm: You have been disconnected from the MCSR Ranked server.
projectelo.text.disconnected_server.reco: You have been disconnected from the MCSR Ranked server. try reconnecting... (%s times left)
projectelo.text.disconnected_server.fail: Failed to reconnect to the MCSR Ranked server.
projectelo.text.disconnected_server.succ: Successfully reconnect to the MCSR Ranked server.
Successfully reconnect to the MCSR Ranked server, but your match has been ended.
projectelo.text.not_played_match: You have not played any Ranked or Classic matches yet.
projectelo.text.report_detailed_info: Describe the details of the report...
projectelo.text.manually_update: Sorry, but you need to manually update. :(
projectelo.match_flag.filtered_seed.desc: If you leave the world seed text input blank, you will be given a filtered random seed.
projectelo.match_flag.igt_mode.descripti: Change final time to use IGT instead of RTA. If the 'Waiting All Completion' option is disabled, the player with the fastest completion will still win.
projectelo.match_flag.show_advancement.d: When any player completes an advancement, their advancement message will be displayed.
projectelo.match_flag.show_first_advance: Advancement messages will displayed only once for each advancement. no longer be displayed if someone has already completed same advancement.
projectelo.match_flag.show_coords.descri: When any player completes an advancement, their coordinates message will be displayed.
projectelo.match_flag.waiting_all_player: The match will not end until all players have completed the run.
projectelo.match_flag.reduce_waiting_tim: Reduce match start waiting time from 10 seconds to 5 seconds.
projectelo.match_flag.reset_message.desc: Send a message to all players when a player resets the world.
projectelo.match_flag.standardized_perch: The Ender dragon will start perching almost same timing for all players.
projectelo.match_flag.immediately_dragon: The Ender dragon will start perching as fast as possible.
projectelo.match_flag.disable_f3.descrip: Disable F3 features during a match.
projectelo.match_flag.disable_copy_locat: Disable F3 + C during a match to prevent copying location to the clipboard. For no-calculators.
projectelo.match_flag.icarus.description: Start the match with 1 elytra and 64 fireworks.
projectelo.match_flag.half_heart.descrip: Start the match with only half of heart. (1 HP)
projectelo.match_flag.hardcore.descripti: World's difficulty fixed to hard and you will automatically reset the world when you die.
projectelo.tooltip.copy_match_code: Click to copy the match code.
projectelo.tooltip.toggle_match_code_vis: Click to toggle visibility of match code.
projectelo.tooltip.seed_vote.like: I did enjoy playing this seed
projectelo.tooltip.seed_vote.dislike: I didn't enjoy playing this seed
projectelo.tooltip.click_to_open_url: Click to open on your Web browser
projectelo.tooltip.click_to_open_match_i: Click to Open the Match Info
projectelo.toast.blocked_feature: You can't use this feature during the match
projectelo.toast.blocked_feature_private: You can't use this feature during a private match
Just an host can be use this feature during a private match
projectelo.toast.start_seed_change_vote: If the opponent player agrees within 30 seconds, this seed will change
projectelo.toast.start_draw_vote: If the opponent player agrees within 30 seconds, this match will end in a draw.
projectelo.toast.report_submitted: A report has been submitted. We will review it soon!
projectelo.geometry_dash.playing: Press 'Up' key to jump! Watch out for the spikes!
projectelo.geometry_dash.dead: Nice try, Press 'Up' key to restart!
projectelo.button.public_third_party.des: Whether to display your %s tag/name on your profile.
projectelo.option.show_my_progress.descr: Toggle Match Live HUD shows your progress.
projectelo.option.chat_filter.descriptio: Filtering bad words on Live Chat in Match
projectelo.option.hide_profile.descripti: Anonymously display your profile to opponents in ranked matches. It will be revealed immediately after the match ends.
Anonymously display opponent player profile in ranked matches. It will be revealed immediately after the match ends.
projectelo.option.hide_opponent_advancem: Whether display the opponent's advancement messages in chat.
projectelo.option.max_world_save.descrip: If you have Ranked worlds more than this value, the oldest Ranked world will be deleted.
projectelo.option.enable_discord_rpc.des: Display that you are playing MCSR Ranked on your Discord activity.
projectelo.option.hide_elo_score.descrip: Hide your/opponent's elo while during match.
projectelo.warning.leaderboard_discord_l: Your profile must be linked with Discord for your rank to display on your profile and the leaderboard.
projectelo.warning.available_only_patreo: Available if you are a Patreon supporter.
projectelo.warning.resource_pack: You are using illegal resource packs:
projectelo.warning.not_enough_memory: You do not have enough memory! Increase allocated memory to 2048MB or higher.
projectelo.warning.ssl_exception_try_aga: An SSLHandshakeException occurred. You can try again without using SSL, but it may have secure issues. If you don't want it, update your Java.
projectelo.warning.atum_modified: You are using MCSR Ranked. runs have some gameplay changes, so it will be not legal on the speedrun.com leaderboards. Do you want to continue?
projectelo.warning.not_available_device: Currently this feature is not available on your device!
projectelo.warning.message_spam: You've sent too many chats! try again later.
projectelo.tip_message.title: Tips!
projectelo.tip_message.0: Did you know? "MCSR" means Minecraft Speedrunning.
projectelo.tip_message.1: Don't forget to join our Discord server!
projectelo.tip_message.2: All players in a match will have the same RNG... except the dragon.
projectelo.tip_message.3: Are you enjoying? Please support us on Patreon! :)
projectelo.tip_message.5: When pillaring up using alternating slabs, 6 total logs can produce 48 blocks of height.
projectelo.tip_message.7: If you are new to Ranked, it could help to practice first ;)
projectelo.tip_message.8: Not showing up on the leaderboard? Just link your Discord to your account.
projectelo.tip_message.9: The ender dragon’s chance to fireball the player at certain intervals is 50% when the player is close to the end fountain, and about 10% when far away.
projectelo.tip_message.10: Have any feedback? Feel free to post your feedback on our Discord server!
projectelo.tip_message.11: Fall damage is reduced by 80% when landing on a haybale and 50% when landing on a bed.
projectelo.tip_message.12: Cobblestone takes 1.5 seconds to break with a wooden pickaxe, while stone takes only 1.15 seconds.
projectelo.tip_message.13: Gravel takes 0.25 seconds to mine with a stone shovel and 0.15 seconds with both iron and diamond shovels.
projectelo.tip_message.14: Strongholds attempt to avoid generating in oceans and swamps, and are occasionally pushed to other biomes nearby.
projectelo.tip_message.15: Most hostile mobs have a chance to despawn if more than 32 blocks away from a player, and are forced to despawn when over 128 blocks away.
projectelo.tip_message.16: Dolphin’s grace allows the player to swim at a speed of 9.8 blocks per second, while boating gives a speed of 8 blocks per second.
projectelo.tip_message.17: Unlike bed and respawn anchor explosions, TNT drops all blocks destroyed and does not generate fire.
projectelo.tip_message.18: Increasing the game difficulty will increase the rate of fire spreading, but not the start of fire generation.
projectelo.tip_message.19: Combining dirt and gravel to make coarse dirt is a great way to turn gravity blocks into standard ones.
projectelo.tip_message.20: At the top of desert pyramids, terracotta has a default breaking time of 6.25 seconds, while sandstone takes 4 seconds.
projectelo.tip_message.21: Boats will prevent fall damage unless you fall exactly 12, 13, 49, 51, 111, 114, 198, 202, 310, or 315 blocks.
projectelo.tip_message.22: Certain items create air pockets for players to breathe underwater including doors, pressure plates, fence gates, beds, and sugarcane.
projectelo.tip_message.23: Excess early iron can be crafted into shears for leaf blocks, doors for breathing underwater, or iron bars for pillaring up.
projectelo.tip_message.24: Shields only prevent damage from the front side of the player’s hitbox, meaning attacks angled from above or below will still land.
projectelo.tip_message.25: Piglins become angered up to 16 blocks away from the player's position when mining a block of gold or chest.
projectelo.tip_message.26: When angered, full-health piglins are willing to fall 5 blocks on easy, 9 blocks on medium, and 13 blocks on hard difficulty.
projectelo.tip_message.27: With 3 emeralds you can trade for a bucket of cod with a fisherman, 18 bread with a farmer, or an iron axe with a weaponsmith.
projectelo.tip_message.28: Some mobs reduce the spawnrate of identical mobs nearby, including skeletons in soul sand valley biomes and endermen in warped forests.
projectelo.tip_message.29: Soul sand blocks have a height of 0.875, compared to the 1 of most other blocks including soul soil.
projectelo.tip_message.30: Piglins are naturally aggressive towards wither skeletons, but not hoglins that naturally spawn in bastions.
projectelo.tip_message.31: Mobs like piglins and wither skeletons will try to avoid pathing on to lava, fire, and magma blocks.
projectelo.tip_message.32: Wood from crimson and warped forest trees can craft most items regular wood can except for boats.
projectelo.tip_message.33: The lodestone chest in bridge bastions cannot contain obsidian, but can contain iron.
projectelo.tip_message.34: Piglins can still become angered for about 1-2 seconds after losing line of sight to players opening chests.
projectelo.tip_message.35: Crafting spectral arrows requires lots of glowstone, but can effectively double your arrow count.
projectelo.tip_message.36: Ghast fireballs have an explosion power of 1, TNT is 4, and beds and respawn anchors are 5.
projectelo.tip_message.37: If an eye of ender is right clicked while looking at a filled end portal frame block it will not be thrown.
projectelo.tip_message.38: Each end portal frame block has a 10% chance of being already filled upon generation.
projectelo.tip_message.39: End portal rooms can only generate at least 7 rooms away from the stronghold entry staircase.
projectelo.tip_message.40: End portal rooms, unlike other stronghold rooms, cannot be overwritten by natural features like ravines.
projectelo.tip_message.41: Each end island will generate the same set of 10 obsidian pillars, just in different configurations.
projectelo.tip_message.42: The ender dragon’s chance of perching at certain intervals starts at 1 in 13, but becomes 1 in 3 when all 10 end crystals are destroyed.
projectelo.tip_message.43: The ender dragon will fireball the player when an end crystal is destroyed, regardless of the source of damage.
projectelo.tip_message.44: The intended bastion will always contain 3+ iron and 5+ obsidian in convenient chests.
projectelo.tip_message.45: Seed type distributions are determined by your rank, with low elo runners being given easier seeds on average.
projectelo.tip_message.46: The intended fortress will always generate within 17 chunks of the bastion. You can use your pie chart to find the exact direction.
projectelo.tip_message.47: There are 4 ranks ranging from 0-2400 elo: Coal, Iron, Gold, and Diamond. Each rank has 3 tiers, with 3 being the highest
